verses.roman:
kaṁsaḥ sunāmā nyagrodhaḥ
kaṅkaḥ śaṅkuḥ suhūs tathā
rāṣṭrapālo 'tha dhṛṣṭiś ca
tuṣṭimān augrasenayaḥ

synonyms: kaṁsaḥ—Kaṁsa; sunāmā—Sunāmā; nyagrodhaḥ—Nyagrodha; kaṅkaḥ—Kaṅka; śaṅkuḥ—Śaṅku; suhūḥ—Suhū; tathā—as well as; rāṣṭrapālaḥ—Rāṣṭrapāla; atha—thereafter; dhṛṣṭiḥ—Dhṛṣṭi; ca—also; tuṣṭimān—Tuṣṭimān; augrasenayaḥ—the sons of Ugrasena.
translation: Kaṁsa, Sunāmā, Nyagrodha, Kaṅka, Śaṅku, Suhū, Rāṣṭrapāla, Dhṛṣṭi and Tuṣṭimān were the sons of Ugrasena.
